Author: Scarletkittens
Text: Jesus. That’s a real doozy. It’s even worse coming from family, in my opinion. You want to give them the ignorance pass but then again, they should know better than anyone else. I’m so sorry that happened to you.

Author: byie
Text: Yes. When I got out of the car I had to squeeze through a few boxes and my brother said “hurry up! You’re.... relatively.. small?” Hit me like a bag of bricks.
